translations.text: Did you see him<sup foot_note="182856">1</sup> who gives the lie to the Reward and Punishment<sup foot_note="182857">2</sup> of the Hereafter?<sup foot_note="182858">3</sup>
Such is<sup foot_note="182859">1</sup> the one who repulses the orphans away,<sup foot_note="182860">2</sup>
and urges<sup foot_note="182861">1</sup> not the feeding of the needy.<sup foot_note="182862">2</sup>
Woe, then, to those who pray,<sup foot_note="182863">1</sup>
but are heedless in their Prayers,<sup foot_note="182864">1</sup>
those who do good (in order) to be seen,<sup foot_note="182865">1</sup>
and deny people the articles of common necessity.<sup foot_note="182866">1</sup>
